amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 12 of the bill which would require Federal agencies to conduct a retrospective cost-benefit analysis of any regulation at the request of the Chairman or Ranking Member of a Congressional Committee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 245 (Roll no. 61).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Cummings.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 245 (Roll no. 61).
